snippet: Masahiro Tanaka buttoned up a No. 19 pinstriped jersey at Yankee Stadium, tugged on that famous navy blue cap and proclaimed, in English, “I’m very happy to be a Yankee.”
abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column holds that Masahiro Tanaka's first public appearance as a New York Yankee highlights fact that team has once again become interesting following a dismal season; holds that Tanaka's meteoric rise, and vast sum he will be paid by the Yankees, means that he will have to play at an elite level from day one.
lead_paragraph: Masahiro Tanaka buttoned up a No. 19 pinstriped jersey at Yankee Stadium, tugged on that famous navy blue cap and proclaimed, in English, “I’m very happy to be a Yankee.”

headline.main: Yankees’ Newest Star Welcomes Biggest Stage
headline.print_headline: Yankees’ Newest Star Welcomes Biggest Stage
